title: Chia Network Lays Off Third of Its Staff as Loss of Banker Delayed Going Public
description: Chia Network cut a third of its workforce today as the blockchain platform sought to reestablish a lost banking relationship, the company told CoinDesk, further delaying what Chia had hoped would be a rapid path to listing as a public company.

title: Bitcoin solidly above short-term holder cost basis reflecting strong investor confidence
description:
Quick Take Bitcoin is currently standing firm above the short-term holder cost basis, with a price point pegged at $27,800 as it currently trades above $28,000. This cost basis refers to investors who have held Bitcoin for less than six months, emphasizing their influence on the market’s short-term trends. Previous data points indicate that the […]

title: Rollbit reports $37.7M revenue, burns $5.25M worth of coins in September
description: Rollbit, a cryptocurrency gaming site, has reported a substantial revenue accumulation across its multifaceted services, including its casino, crypto futures, and sportsbook, totaling approximately $37,710,207 in September. This announcement highlights the platform’s significant financial growth and successful diversification into various entertainment and trading sectors. title: RINO Makes Enterprise Wallet Free
description: RINO today announced that it is making its enterprise wallet free to use. RINO’s enterprise wallet enables financial industry best practices such as spending limits and four-eye approvals. Organizations can now sign up instantly and get started without having to deal with sales people or subscription models. Monero core-team member binaryFate, an early investor in [...]

title: XRP Makes a Strong Comeback, Reincluded in TaiFu 30 Crypto Index
description: XRP is back on the TaiFu™ 30 Crypto Index with a weighted share of 2.756%, albeit still overshadowed by Bitcoin’s massive 49.353% and Ethereum’s 19.413%. The restoration follows a crucial legal ruling in July, dispelling the SEC’s claim of XRP being a security, a turnaround fostering its re-listing on major exchanges. As blockchain markets continue [...]

title: US Dollar Soars to 10-Month High; BRICS Currencies Weaken – Is Bitcoin (BTC) Ready for Takeoff?
description: The U.S. dollar is strong due to high interest rates and robust economic data, pressuring the euro, yen, and Swiss franc. description:
